repository.description: Set this to `registry.gitlab.io/appsemble/appsemble` to support prerelease versions.

tag.description: If specified, this Docker image tag will be used. Otherwise, it will use the chartâ€™s `appVersion`.

pullPolicy.description: This can be used to override the default image pull policy.

nameOverride.description: This can be used to override the name in the templates.

fullnameOverride.description: This can be used to override the full name in the templates.

type.description: The type of the Appsemble service.

port.description: The HTTP port on which the Appsemble service will be exposed to the cluster.

enabled.description: Whether or not the service should be exposed through an ingress.

host.description: The host name on which the ingress will expose the service.

secretName.description: The secret name to use to configure TLS for the top level host.

wildcardSecretName.description: The secret name to use to configure TLS for the direct wildcard host.

issuer.description: The name of the cert-manager issuer to use for apps.

clusterIssuer.description: The name of the cert-manager cluster issuer to use for apps.

route.description: OpenShift Route configuration. Use this instead of ingress on OpenShift clusters.

enabled.description: Whether or not the service should be exposed through an OpenShift Route.

host.description: The host name on which the route will expose the service.

termination.description: TLS termination type: edge, passthrough, or reencrypt.

insecureEdgeTerminationPolicy.description: Policy for handling insecure traffic: Allow, Redirect, or None.

resources.description: Resource limits and requests for containers.

deployment.description: Resource limits and requests for the main deployment.

jobs.description: Resource limits and requests for Job containers (migrate, provision, etc.).

cronjobs.description: Resource limits and requests for CronJob containers.

backupCronjob.description: Resource limits and requests for the backup CronJob container (requires more memory than standard cronjobs).

smtpSecret.description: The secret to use for configuring SMTP. The secret should contain the following values: `host`, `port`, `secure`, `user`, `pass`, `from`.

imapSecret.description: The secret to use for configuring IMAP. The secret should contain the following values: `imap-host`, `imap-port`, `imap-secure`, `imap-user`, `imap-pass`, `imap-copy-to-sent-folder`.

adminApiSecret.description: The secret to use for authenticating admin users, e.g. for newsletter-related endpoints. The secret should contain the following values: `admin-api-secret`.

oauthSecret.description: The secret which holds client ids and client secrets for OAuth2 providers.

allowedDomains.description: A list of domains on which Sentry integration will be enabled. Wildcards are supported.

secret.description: The secret from which to read the Sentry DSN.

environment.description: The environment to send with Sentry error reports

secretSecret.description: The Kubernetes secret which holds the `SECRET` environment variable.

stripeApiSecretKey.description: Api key used for connecting to Stripe.

stripeWebhookSecret.description: Secret used for authenticating incoming Stripe webhooks.

jobsHistoryLimit.description: How long to keep logs for cronjobs in days.

migrateTo.description: If specified, the database will be migrated to this specific version. To upgrade to the latest version, specify `next`

skipCustomDomains.description: If specified, certificates for ingresses for custom domains of apps and app collections will not be issued

validate.description: If `true`, will validate app definitions before saving them.

save.description: If `true`, will save the migrated app definitions after they have been patched successfully.

batch.description: If specified, will patch the number of apps specified per iteration.

proxy.description: If `true`, The proxy is trusted for logging purposes.

forceProtocolHttps.description: If `true`, the Helm chart assumes the application is reached over HTTPS

postgresSSL.description: If `true`, connect establish the PostgreSQL connection over SSL.

databaseBenchmark.description: If `true`, enable query timing. Logs execution time for each SQL query and warns for slow queries.

slowQueryThreshold.description: Threshold in milliseconds. Queries slower than this are logged as warnings when benchmark mode is enabled.

enabled.description: If specified, rate limiting will be applied to emails sent by apps without a custom mail server configured.

dailyLimit.description: The maximum number of emails an app can send per day without a custom mail server configured.

alertOrganizationOwner.description: Whether to alert the app's organization owner when the daily email limit is reached.

remote.description: A remote Appsemble server to connect to in order to synchronize blocks.

securityEmail.description: The default security contact email for reporting security vulnerabilities.

provision.description: Provision the database with a pre-configured account and client credentials. This is for development purposes only.

clientCredentials.description: Client credentials that can be used to authenticate the user.

email.description: The email address of the user account.

name.description: The display name of the user account.

password.description: The password of the user account.

timezone.description: The timezone of the user account

organizationRole.description: The role of the provisioned user account inside the provisioned organization

id.description: The id of the organization to provision. Ignored if the organization exists in imported data

subscription.description: The type of subscription plan to provision for the organization. Ignored if no organization is provisioned.

backups.description: The s3 configuration for where the appsemble database backups will be stored

bucket.description: The name of the backups bucket

filename.description: The prefix for the backup files before their timestamp

existingSecret.description: The name of the existing kubernetes secret to get the access key and secret key from. Must contain access-key and secret-key
